question:
Consider the following pairs:
Person Field of activity
1. Subramania Bharati Literature
2. Mokshagundan Visvesvaraya Medicine
3. Jamsetji Tata Nusserwanji Engineering and Planning
4. Rabanindra Nath Tagore Painting
Of these pairs
explanation:
Chinnaswami Subramania Bharathi, also known as Bharathiyar, was a Tamil writer, poet, journalist, Indian independence activist, a social reformer and a polyglot. H was popularly known as \"Mahakavi Bharathi\". He was a pioneer of modern Tamil poetry and is considered one of the greatest Tamil literary figures of all time.
Sir Mokshagundam Visvesvaraya was an Indian civil engineer and statesman and the 19th Diwan of Mysore, who served from 1912 to 1919. He received India\'s highest honour, the Bharat Ratna, in 1955.
Jamsetji Nusserwanji Tata was an Indian pioneer industrialist, who founded the Tata Group, India\'s biggest conglomerate company. He was born to a Parsi Zoroastrian family in Navsari, then part of the princely state of Baroda. He founded what would later become the Tata Group of companies.
Rabindranath Tagore was a polymath, poet, musician, and artist from the Indian subcontinent. He reshaped Bengali literature and music, as well as Indian art with Contextual Modernism in the late 19th and early 20th centuries.
